message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to let it go for $170. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it.
I appreciate the enthusiasm, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $155, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $145, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $152, which is the best I can do. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I'm getting close to my limit, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll do $142.5. That's the best I can do.

I'm getting a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll do $151. It's still a good deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll do $141.5. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
I'm getting a bit frustrated, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'm not going to give it away. I'll do $149. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
I'm really close to walking away, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll do $139.5. If I don't get a better deal, I'll have to consider buying from John for $120.
